title: AC Basics: Learn All About Alternating Current

media:group.media:title: AC Basics: Learn All About Alternating Current
media:group.media:description:
In this video, we'll teach you about Alternating Current (AC), and how it works. We'll discuss the types of AC, and how they're used in everyday life.
👉 👉👉 FREE design software ➡️ https://www.altium.com/asp/the-engineering-mindset/
